title: Type I Tobit Bayesian Additive Regression Trees for Censored Outcome Regression. (arXiv:2211.07506v3 [econ.EM] UPDATED)
abstract: Censoring occurs when an outcome is unobserved beyond some threshold value. Methods that do not account for censoring produce biased predictions of the unobserved outcome. This paper introduces Type I Tobit Bayesian Additive Regression Tree (TOBART-1) models for censored outcomes. Simulation results and real data applications demonstrate that TOBART-1 produces accurate predictions of censored outcomes. TOBART-1 provides posterior intervals for the conditional expectation and other quantities of interest. The error term distribution can have a large impact on the expectation of the censored outcome. Therefore the error is flexibly modeled as a Dirichlet process mixture of normal distributions.

Title: Type I Tobit Bayesian Additive Regression Trees for Censored Outcome Regression. (arXiv:2211.07506v3 [econ.EM] UPDATED)
Abstract: Censoring occurs when an outcome is unobserved beyond some threshold value. Methods that do not account for censoring produce biased predictions of the unobserved outcome. This paper introduces Type I Tobit Bayesian Additive Regression Tree (TOBART-1) models for censored outcomes. Simulation results and real data applications demonstrate that TOBART-1 produces accurate predictions of censored outcomes. TOBART-1 provides posterior intervals for the conditional expectation and other quantities of interest. The error term distribution can have a large impact on the expectation of the censored outcome. Therefore the error is flexibly modeled as a Dirichlet process mixture of normal distributions.
translated_title: 带有截断结果回归的I型Tobit贝叶斯加性回归树
translated_abstract: 当结果超过某个阈值时，就会发生截断。不考虑截断的方法会产生对未观测到的结果的有偏预测。本文引入了一种适用于截断结果的I型Tobit贝叶斯加性回归树（TOBART-1）模型。模拟结果和实际数据应用表明，TOBART-1能够准确预测截断结果。TOBART-1提供了条件期望和其他感兴趣的数量的后验区间。误差项的分布对截断结果的期望有很大影响。因此，误差被灵活地建模为正态分布的Dirichlet过程混合。
tldr: 本文提出了一种适用于截断结果的I型Tobit贝叶斯加性回归树模型（TOBART-1），它能够准确预测截断结果，并提供了后验区间。
